Package com.example.demo.characters

Class EnemyPlane

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
com.example.demo.characters.ActiveActor
com.example.demo.characters.ActiveActorDestructible
com.example.demo.characters.FighterPlane
com.example.demo.characters.EnemyPlane
All Implemented Interfaces:
Destructible, javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class EnemyPlane extends FighterPlane
Represents an enemy plane in the game, inheriting from the `FighterPlane` class.

This class encapsulates the behavior and properties of an enemy plane, including its movement, projectile firing, and health attributes. It supports customizable parameters such as position, speed, fire rate, and health while also providing default values.

  • Constructor Details

    • EnemyPlane

      public EnemyPlane(double initialXPos, double initialYPos, int horizontalVelocity, double fireRate, int health)
      Constructs a customizable enemy plane with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the enemy plane.
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the enemy plane.
      horizontalVelocity - The speed at which the enemy plane moves horizontally.
      fireRate - The likelihood of firing a projectile in each frame.
      health - The health value representing the durability of the enemy plane.

    • EnemyPlane

      public EnemyPlane(double initialXPos, double initialYPos)
      Default constructor for enemy planes with predefined attributes.
      Parameters:
      initialXPos - The initial X position of the enemy plane.
      initialYPos - The initial Y position of the enemy plane.

  • Method Details

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the enemy plane horizontally on the screen.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • fireProjectile

      public ActiveActorDestructible fireProjectile()
      Fires a projectile if the enemy plane is within screen bounds and the conditions for firing are met.
      Specified by:
      fireProjectile in class FighterPlane
      Returns:
      An instance of `EnemyProjectile` representing the fired projectile, or `null` if the conditions aren't met.

    • updateActor

      public void updateActor()
      Updates the enemy plane's state in each game frame.
      Specified by:
      updateActor in class ActiveActorDestructible

    • canFireProjectile

      private boolean canFireProjectile()
      Determines if the enemy plane can fire a projectile in the current game frame.
      Returns:
      true if a projectile should be fired, based on the fire rate probability.

    • isWithinScreenBounds

      private boolean isWithinScreenBounds()
      Checks if the enemy plane remains within the visible bounds of the game screen.
      Returns:
      true if the enemy plane's position is within screen bounds, false otherwise.
